[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Struct: ConsensusPublisher] [Clone Safety] The Clone implementation clones Arc pointers but shares underlying state - can this lead to use-after-free or data races if clones outlive the original publisher? (High)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Struct: ConsensusPublisher] [RwLock Poisoning] If a panic occurs while holding the RwLock write lock on active_subscribers, does lock poisoning prevent all future subscriptions, causing permanent observer failure? (High)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: new()] [Channel Size Cast] The cast of max_network_channel_size to usize could truncate on 32-bit systems - can this cause unexpectedly small channels leading to message loss? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: start()] [Interval Overflow] Can setting garbage_collection_interval_ms to very large values cause integer overflow in Duration::from_millis, triggering panics or incorrect timing? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: process_network_message()] [Subscription Flood] Can an attacker send thousands of Subscribe requests from different peers to exhaust memory in the active_subscribers HashSet, causing validator OOM? (High)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: garbage_collect_subscriptions()] [GC Overhead] With thousands of subscribers, does the O(n) iteration and HashSet operations in garbage collection cause periodic latency spikes affecting consensus timing? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: start()] [Channel Saturation] Can an attacker keep the outbound_message_sender channel constantly full through subscription floods, preventing legitimate consensus messages from being published? (High)
